channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Easy Video Player
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy Video Player

item.title: CVE-2022-3937|2024-08-03T01:27:53.880Z -- unknown -- easy%20video%20player
item.description: The Easy Video Player WordPress plugin before 1.2.2.3 does not sanitize and escapes some parameters, which could allow users with a role as low as Contributor to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
